Properties.ProtectedString: if script.Parent.className == "Hat" then script.Parent.Handle.Mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.6, 0.9) elseif script.Parent.className == "Part" then script.Parent.Mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.6, 0.9) end

local Tool = script.Parent local equipped = false local sound = Instance.new("Sound") sound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=24907199" sound.Parent = Tool.Handle
function findNearestMetallicEgg(pos) local metallicEggs = {} local dist = 50 local list = game.Workspace:FindFirstChild("eggroot") if(list ~= nil) then list = list:GetChildren() for x = 1, #list do if (list[x].Name == "4") or (list[x].Name == "10") or (list[x].Name == "2") and ((list[x].Position - pos).magnitude < dist) then table.insert(metallicEggs,list[x]) end end end return metallicEggs end
function drawInEggs(eggsToDrawIn)
for i=1,#eggsToDrawIn do
local DirZ = 0 local DirX = 0 local DirY = 0
if( eggsToDrawIn[i].className == "Part") then DirZ = Tool.Handle.Position.Z - eggsToDrawIn[i].Position.Z DirX = Tool.Handle.Position.X - eggsToDrawIn[i].Position.X DirY = Tool.Handle.Position.Y - eggsToDrawIn[i].Position.Y elseif (eggsToDrawIn[i]:FindFirstChild("Handle") ~= nil) then DirZ = Tool.Handle.Position.Z - eggsToDrawIn[i].Handle.Position.Z DirX = Tool.Handle.Position.X - eggsToDrawIn[i].Handle.Position.X DirY = Tool.Handle.Position.Y - eggsToDrawIn[i].Handle.Position.Y end local forceUnit = Vector3.new(DirX,DirY,DirZ).unit
if (math.abs(DirZ) + math.abs(DirX) + math.abs(DirY) > 15) then local strength = 800 local f = Instance.new("BodyForce") f.force = forceUnit * strength if( eggsToDrawIn[i].className == "Part") then f.Parent = eggsToDrawIn[i] else f.Parent = eggsToDrawIn[i].Handle end wait(0.01) f.Parent = nil
else
local v = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") v.velocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0) if( eggsToDrawIn[i].className == "Part") then v.Parent = eggsToDrawIn[i] elseif (eggsToDrawIn[i]:FindFirstChild("Handle") ~= nil) then v.Parent = eggsToDrawIn[i].Handle end wait(0.01) v.Parent = nil
-- if egg is rusty egg, magnetize it if (eggsToDrawIn[i].Name == "10") and (eggsToDrawIn[i]:findFirstChild("MagnetizeEgg") == nil) then magnetize = Tool.MagnetizeEgg:clone() magnetize.Parent = eggsToDrawIn[i] end
end
end
end
function onEquipped()
equipped = true findMyEggs() sound.Volume = 1 sound:Play()
end
function onUnequipped()
equipped = false --sound.Volume = 0 end
function findMyEggs()
while equipped do
local eggsToDrawIn = findNearestMetallicEgg(Tool.Handle.Position) if(eggsToDrawIn ~= nil) then drawInEggs(eggsToDrawIn) end wait(0.1)
end
end
script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

if script.Parent.className == "Hat" then script.Parent.Handle.Mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.6, 0.9) elseif script.Parent.className == "Part" then script.Parent.Mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.6, 0.9) end
